scripts.pluginstall: ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugins add org.apache.cordova.console@0.2.10 org.apache.cordova.device@0.2.11 org.apache.cordova.dialogs@0.2.9 org.apache.cordova.file@1.3.0 org.apache.cordova.inappbrowser@0.5.1 org.apache.cordova.network-information@0.2.11 org.apache.cordova.statusbar@0.1.7 && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin add https://github.com/SpiderOak/cordova-plugin-file-transfer.git && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin add https://github.com/SpiderOak/FileViewerPlugin.git && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin add https://github.com/SpiderOak/cordova-HTTP.git org.devgeeks.privacyscreen
scripts.plugremove: ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugins remove org.apache.cordova.console org.apache.cordova.device org.apache.cordova.dialogs org.apache.cordova.file-transfer org.apache.cordova.inappbrowser org.apache.cordova.network-information org.apache.cordova.statusbar && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin remove com.spideroak.fileviewerplugin && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin remove com.synconset.cordovaHTTP && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin remove org.apache.cordova.file org.devgeeks.privacyscreen
